sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da človek
ought to do something
ali
ought to have done something
, izrazimo prepričanje, da bi bilo prav, da nekaj naredi, ali da je bilo prav, da je naredil tako.

seg.quote: She ought to see the doctor.
‘I don't care,’ he said. ‘Well, you ought to,’ she said.
I ought to have said yes.
I ought not to have come here.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekaj
ought to be true
, pričakujemo, da bo res tako.

seg.quote: It ought to be quite easy.
He ought to be out of jail by now.
